channel.title: Comments on: Who’s Tampering with the Trinity? (Part 7) The Biblical Support for Eternal Generation: The Meaning of “Monogeneis”

item.title: By: drake
item.dc:creator: drake
item.description: Are you going to touch on the procession of the Spirit? I currently cannot share a communion with Reformed people because of their rejection of the original nicene creed on this subject.
item.content:encoded: Are you going to touch on the procession of the Spirit? I currently cannot share a communion with Reformed people because of their rejection of the original nicene creed on this subject.
